headline: Northrop Grumman Torpedo Win And Rocket Tests Frame Valuation Debate
summary: Northrop Grumman (NYSE:NOC) secured a US$233 million US Navy contract for an advanced lightweight torpedo program. The torpedo effort includes collaboration with the Australian Defense Force on design and development. The company also completed successful tests of new solid rocket motors aimed at faster production timelines. Northrop Grumman, a major US defense contractor, is deeply involved in naval systems, missile technologies, and space programs. For investors, the new torpedo contract...
